screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .sb.branch file in Branch 1.1
screenshot.caption: SB.BRANCH file open in Branch 1.1

description: Scratch was developed by the Media Lab at MIT (the Massachusetts Institute of Technology) and is primarily used by teachers and students to create animations and games. Branch is a modified version of Scratch that includes features added by Scratch users, such as FanMarioPL, Zeusking19, Interest, djdolphin, and powerpoint56.
The SB.BRANCH file is the main file associated with Branch and is a variation of the .SB project file created by Scratch. Branch project files may be used to create stories, games, and animations.
NOTE: To create an SB.BRANCH file with Branch, select File â†’ Save or Save As... .
